channel.title: Jframe while client is jarr'd?
channel.description: Is it possible to make it so my client has a j frame while it's in the jar format? When i jar my client, it removes the jframe..why is that?

item.title: Jframe while client is jarr'd?
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:480344”][quote author=iBunnie link=topic=598579.msg4209527#msg4209527 date=1359340874]

But it is my question. The reason of why it doesn’t show up is because you’re jarring the client class, not the Jframe class.

But, wouldn’t i need to jar the client class? Wouldn’t it then remove some other features?
[/quote]
Why not just try to jar it with the jframe class and see what happens. That would give you the answer you’re looking for, wouldn’t it?[/quote]
It would have if i was home at that moment.

Read full topic

item.title: Jframe while client is jarr'd?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“iBunnie, post:5, topic:480344”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=598579.msg4209478#msg4209478 date=1359338371]
But it is my question. The reason of why it doesn’t show up is because you’re jarring the client class, not the Jframe class.
[/quote]
But, wouldn’t i need to jar the client class? Wouldn’t it then remove some other features?[/quote]
Why not just try to jar it with the jframe class and see what happens. That would give you the answer you’re looking for, wouldn’t it?

Read full topic
